Articles.Content:
Okay this is just a funny idea.

Maybe you already experienced that, too - your rocket is flying somewhere manned by just one Kerbal because you left the other to perform some important task somewhere. You switch to IVA view of your MK2 Lander Can and you realize there's nobody sitting in the pilot seat and the ship is steering itself like a Flying Dutchman.

So I thought the second seat in the Lander Can could get some controls, too. Or perhaps they could switch seats automatically when the pilot leaves. Because I always find that view quite disturbing and sending the Kerbal on EVA to switch seats during reentry is not very safe.
